Package database

Class CustomerDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.ReadWriteDao<Customer>
      • database.CustomerDao
  • public class CustomerDao
extends ReadWriteDao<Customer>
    DAO providing read/write access to customers in the database, which it represents in the application as instances of Customer. It also provides a specialized query for one of the reports.
    Author:
    Joseph T. Lapp

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  CustomerDao.CountryDivisionCount
      POJO for objects returned by getCountryDivisionCounts() for the report of customer counts by customer country and "first level division".

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CustomerDao​(java.sql.Connection conn, User user)
      Constructs an customer DAO in contexts where a division cache is NOT already available.
      CustomerDao​(java.sql.Connection conn, User user, DivisionCache divisionCache)
      Constructs a customer DAO in contexts where a division cache is already available, sparing the DAO from having to load it.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void close()
      Closes any open resources in this DAO, but does not close the database connection, allowing the connection to be shared with other DAOs for faster processing of a sequence of operations.

      Creates a customer from the provided result set.

      Deletes the indicated customer from the database, first deleting any appointments that reference the customer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomerDao

        public CustomerDao​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                   User user)
            throws DatabaseException
        Constructs an customer DAO in contexts where a division cache is NOT already available. It loads a division cache from the database.
        Parameters:
        conn - An open database connection, which it leaves open
        user - The logged-in use
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - on database error

      • CustomerDao

        public CustomerDao​(java.sql.Connection conn,
                   User user,
                   DivisionCache divisionCache)
            throws DatabaseException
        Constructs a customer DAO in contexts where a division cache is already available, sparing the DAO from having to load it.
        Parameters:
        conn - An open database connection, which it leaves open
        user - The logged-in use
        divisionCache - The division cache
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - on database error

      • getCountryDivisionCounts

        public java.util.List<CustomerDao.CountryDivisionCount> getCountryDivisionCounts()
                                                                          throws DatabaseException
        Queries the database for customer counts by customer country and "first level division".
        Returns:
        A list of customer counts by customer country and division
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - on database error

           throws DatabaseException

      • getUpdateStatement

        protected java.sql.PreparedStatement getUpdateStatement()
        Returns an update statement prepared for updating a customer. The last parameter of this prepared statement must take a customer ID.
        Specified by:
        getUpdateStatement in class ReadWriteDao<Customer>
        Returns:
        An update statement for updating a customer
